paper_abstract: In this paper we study possible multivariate generalizations of construction of n-copulas with a given diagonal section. In the case of Archimedean n-copulas we prove that Frank's condition, which establishes when an Archimedean 2-copula is characterized by its diagonal section, can be extended to larger dimensions. (c) 2013 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Frank's condition for multivariate Archimedean copulas
